name: Smell The Roses [Web Based]
description:
[Google Form]

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc1EUNFEENsFV5a3llpohgSaYa2Xgq466aEDkSObHoyK5Ys7g/viewform

[INFORMATION ON THE STUDY]

Please be aware that by downloading this game you are entering yourself into a study on game design in which data on the amount of time you play this game will be recorded anonymously

This game is a procedurally generated 3D Platformed in which your goal is to collect the 4 roses at the highest platforms in the level.
